summary: As the Bride and the Groom prepare for the wedding in the pale desert, a tale of unappeased desires; forbidden yearnings, and conflicted choices unfolds. Now, three lovers stand powerless before the true nature of man. Is fate unavoidable?
cast: Inma Cuesta|Álex García|Asier Etxeandia|Luisa Gavasa|Carlos Álvarez-Nóvoa|Leticia Dolera|Consuelo Trujillo|Ana Fernández|María Alfonsa Rosso|Manuela Vellés|Verónika Moral|Laura Contreras|Mariana Cordero|Mariano Anós|David Moreau|Jorge Usón|Pedro Rebollo|Carmela del Campo|Álvaro Baumann|Anchel Pablo|Laura Gómez-Lacueva|Alberto Castrillo|Óscar de Luna|José Luis Lahoz|César Grasa|Manuel Contreras|Maite Sequeira|Amelia Bella|Cati Pueyo|Gabriel Pemán|Bruno Mota|Martín Contreras|Carolina Mega|Hugo Grimalt|Antonio Ballestín|David Kopa|Ignacio Alfaye
title: La novia
